title: oc5.0.0rc2: external storage directory size ? with dropbox mounted
body:
when i connect to dropbox, i have two different accounts that i mount.  the first size is shown correctly as 131 mb.

the second one is huge, relatively, and it is about 3.44 gb.  the size for this one is shown as a ? and says "couldn't be determined" in the ui.

opensuse 12.2 and mysql, running external storage and oc 5.0.0 rc2.
